channel.title: contact on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in contact on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: How to best contact us
item.description: There are many ways to connect with the PrestaShop team. From support requests to development contributions, we’re here to work with you! Since we’re an open source company, there are a number of places where we collaborate with the PrestaShop community. For new and old community members alike, it’s helpful to have this information in one place. Without further ado, this is how we can work together! The quick links Getting support Contacting our teams Reporting issues to the Core team Talking to the Addons team about bought modules/themes Helping the i18n improve the translation Contributing to the User documentation Contributing to the 1.
